metadata.title: CVE-2020-27187 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in KDE Partition Manager 4.1.0 before 4.2.0. Thekpmcore_externalcommand helper contains a logic flaw in which the serviceinvoking D-Bus is not properly checked. An attacker on the local machinecan replace /etc/fstab, and execute mount and other partitioning relatedcommands, while KDE Partition Manager is running. the mount command canthen be used to gain full root privileges.

criterions.comment: kpmcore package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
